backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing submissions, blob storage, and access‑controlled user/admin APIs with profile management and media uploads.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs for frontend upload flow and media‑policy alignment.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries for each frontend file covering components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining design tokens, themes, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document bootstrapping the React app with favicon, metadata, and main script.
frontend/README.md: Frontend overview describing features, admin login details, tech stack, and project structure.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines TanStack Router routes, admin‑guarded pages, and global providers like ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAudio: Button for admins to download audio blobs by fetching bytes, generating a file, and triggering a download.
Admin audio player that streams audio via a direct URL with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMedia: Generic admin download button for audio or video blobs with MIME detection and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminVideo: Admin video player that streams video via a direct URL with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/DeleteSubm: Admin delete button showing a confirmation dialog and executing submission deletion with navigation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/admin/ExportTool: Provides CSV export functionality for submissions and a placeholder ZIP export button using a UI card layout.
Component that checks admin session state and blocks or redirects unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout component providing header, navigation, footer, and conditional rendering for authenticated admin users and the success page.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: In-browser audio recorder with pause, resume, stop, duration tracking, and file attachment, with auto-stop and error handling.
frontend/src/components/LocalCaptchaChal: Simple math‑based CAPTCHA component that validates user input and triggers success or fail callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecorder.ts: Implements audio recording with MediaRecorder, tracking state, timing, errors, and producing a recorded Blob.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, submissions, and admin session management using the backend actor and admin API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining color and layout tokens.
frontend/src/lib/adminApi.ts: Implements client-side admin auth with hardcoded credentials, constant‑time comparison, and sessionStorage-backed sessions.
frontend/src/lib/adminAuth.ts: Empty placeholder module for admin auth logic.
frontend/src/lib/adminSession.ts: Empty file reserved for admin session handling.
frontend/src/lib/audioValidation.ts: Defines allowed audio formats and size limits and provides functions to validate audio files and format size/duration values.
frontend/src/lib/csrf.ts: Provides simple sessionStorage-based CSRF token storage and helper to attach the token to request headers.
frontend/src/lib/downloads.ts: Implements utilities to trigger file downloads from a Blob or URL using a temporary anchor element.
frontend/src/lib/safeText.ts: Provides text sanitization, truncation, and HTML-escaping helpers.
frontend/src/lib/submissionFormat.ts: Formats timestamps, file sizes, durations, and submission IDs, and generates random submission IDs.
frontend/src/lib/videoValidation.ts: Contains deprecated video validation logic with allowed formats, size checks, and a helper for formatting file size.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Renders the React app root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Loads, filters, sorts, and displays all submissions for admins and includes search and export tools.
Implements an admin login form with credential validation and error handling before redirecting to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin UI for viewing and updating settings such as CAPTCHA and upload size limits, with save actions calling update hooks and showing placeholders for unimplemented backend logic.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AuditLogPage.ts: Displays audit log filters and table, fetching log entries via query hooks and noting backend audit tracking is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SubmissionDetai: Loads and displays full details for a single submission including media playback, metadata, timestamps, and delete actions.
frontend/src/pages/StudentUploadPage.tsx: Handles student audio submission with form inputs, audio validation, optional captcha, and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/SubmissionSuccessPage: Displays a simple confirmation message after a successful submission.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive parameters from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current app state, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for the AudioDrop system.
